verses.kjv: Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the LORD your God.
verses.ct: "You must not make idols for yourselves. Don't set up carved images, sacred pillars, or engraved stones anywhere in your land to bow down to them, because I am the LORD your God.

verses.kjv: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the LORD.
verses.ct: You must observe my Sabbaths and treat my sanctuary with reverence. I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;
verses.ct: If you follow my regulations, keep my commandments, and carry them out,

verses.kjv: Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.
verses.ct: then I will send your rains at the right time, the ground will produce its crops, and the trees in the fields will bear their fruit.

verses.kjv: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.
verses.ct: Your grain harvest will last until the grape harvest, and the grape harvest will last until planting season. You will have plenty of food to eat and live securely in your land.

verses.kjv: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.
verses.ct: I will bring peace to the land so you can sleep without anything to frighten you. I will remove dangerous animals from the land, and no army will march through your territory.

verses.kjv: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.
verses.ct: You will pursue your enemies, and they will fall to your swords.

verses.kjv: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.
verses.ct: 5 of you will chase 100, and 100 of you will put 10,000 to flight. Your enemies will fall to your swords.

verses.kjv: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.
verses.ct: I will look on you with favor, make you fruitful, increase your numbers, and uphold my covenant with you.

verses.kjv: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.
verses.ct: You will still be eating last year's harvest when you need to clear it out to make room for the new crop.

verses.kjv: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.
verses.ct: I will place my dwelling among you, and I will not reject you.

verses.kjv: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.
verses.ct: I will live among you and be your God, and you will be my people.

verses.kjv: I am the LORD your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.
verses.ct: I am the LORD your God, who brought you out of Egypt so you would no longer be their slaves. I shattered the bars of your yoke and enabled you to walk with your heads held high."

verses.kjv: But if ye will not hearken unto me, and will not do all these commandments;
verses.ct: "But if you refuse to listen to me and do not carry out all these commandments,

verses.kjv: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:
verses.ct: if you reject my regulations, and if you despise my laws so that you fail to obey all my commandments and break my covenant,

verses.kjv: I also will do this unto you; I will even appoint over you terror, consumption, and the burning ague, that shall consume the eyes, and cause sorrow of heart: and ye shall sow your seed in vain, for your enemies shall eat it.
verses.ct: then this is what I will do to you: I will bring sudden terror on you — wasting disease and fever that will destroy your eyesight and drain your life away. You will plant your seed for nothing, because your enemies will eat your harvest.

verses.kjv: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.
verses.ct: I will turn against you, and you will be defeated by your enemies. Those who hate you will rule over you, and you will run even when no one is chasing you.

verses.kjv: And if ye will not yet for all this hearken unto me, then I will punish you seven times more for your sins.
verses.ct: If after all this you still refuse to listen to me, I will multiply your punishment 7 times over for your sins.

verses.kjv: And I will break the pride of your power; and I will make your heaven as iron, and your earth as brass:
verses.ct: I will shatter your stubborn pride. I will make your sky like iron and your ground like bronze.

verses.kjv: And your strength shall be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increase, neither shall the trees of the land yield their fruits.
verses.ct: Your effort will be wasted, because your land will not produce its crops, and the trees of the land will not bear their fruit.

verses.kjv: And if ye walk contrary unto me, and will not hearken unto me; I will bring seven times more plagues upon you according to your sins.
verses.ct: If you continue to oppose me and refuse to listen to me, I will strike you with 7 times more disasters to match your sins.

verses.kjv: I will also send wild beasts among you, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy your cattle, and make you few in number; and your high ways shall be desolate.
verses.ct: I will send wild animals among you that will take your children from you, kill your livestock, and reduce your numbers until your roads are deserted.

verses.kjv: And if ye will not be reformed by me by these things, but will walk contrary unto me;
verses.ct: If even after these things you refuse to be corrected and continue to oppose me,

verses.kjv: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.
verses.ct: then I myself will oppose you and punish you 7 times over for your sins.

verses.kjv: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.
verses.ct: I will bring war against you to execute the penalty for breaking my covenant. When you retreat into your cities, I will send plague among you, and you will be handed over to your enemies.

verses.kjv: And when I have broken the staff of your bread, ten women shall bake your bread in one oven, and they shall deliver you your bread again by weight: and ye shall eat, and not be satisfied.
verses.ct: When I cut off your food supply, 10 women will be able to bake all their bread in a single oven. They will ration your bread by weight, and you will eat but never have enough.

verses.kjv: And if ye will not for all this hearken unto me, but walk contrary unto me;
verses.ct: If after all of this you still refuse to listen to me and continue to oppose me,

verses.kjv: Then I will walk contrary unto you also in fury; and I, even I, will chastise you seven times for your sins.
verses.ct: then I will oppose you in fierce anger, and I myself will discipline you 7 times over for your sins.

verses.kjv: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.
verses.ct: You will eat the flesh of your own sons, and you will eat the flesh of your own daughters.

verses.kjv: And I will destroy your high places, and cut down your images, and cast your carcases upon the carcases of your idols, and my soul shall abhor you.
verses.ct: I will demolish your hilltop shrines, smash your incense altars, and pile your dead bodies on top of your lifeless idols. I will utterly despise you.

verses.kjv: And I will make your cities waste, and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation, and I will not smell the savour of your sweet odours.
verses.ct: I will turn your cities into ruins and make your sanctuaries desolate. I will no longer accept the pleasing aroma of your offerings.

verses.kjv: And I will bring the land into desolation: and your enemies which dwell therein shall be astonished at it.
verses.ct: I will devastate the land so thoroughly that even your enemies who settle there will be shocked by it.

verses.kjv: And I will scatter you among the heathen, and will draw out a sword after you: and your land shall be desolate, and your cities waste.
verses.ct: I will scatter you among the nations and pursue you with drawn swords. Your land will be devastated, and your cities will lie in ruins.

verses.kjv: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies’ land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.
verses.ct: Then the land will finally enjoy its Sabbath rest during all the time it lies empty, while you are in the land of your enemies. The land will rest and make up for its missed Sabbaths.

verses.kjv: As long as it lieth desolate it shall rest; because it did not rest in your sabbaths, when ye dwelt upon it.
verses.ct: The entire time it lies empty, it will have the rest it never got during the Sabbaths when you were living on it.

verses.kjv: And upon them that are left alive of you I will send a faintness into their hearts in the lands of their enemies; and the sound of a shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee, as fleeing from a sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth.
verses.ct: As for those of you who survive, I will fill their hearts with dread in the lands of their enemies. The rustle of a windblown leaf will send them running. They will flee as though escaping a sword and collapse even when no one is chasing them.

verses.kjv: And they shall fall one upon another, as it were before a sword, when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand before your enemies.
verses.ct: They will stumble over each other as if fleeing from a sword, even though no one pursues them. You will have no ability to stand against your enemies.

verses.kjv: And ye shall perish among the heathen, and the land of your enemies shall eat you up.
verses.ct: You will die among the nations, and the land of your enemies will consume you.

verses.kjv: And they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniquity in your enemies’ lands; and also in the iniquities of their fathers shall they pine away with them.
verses.ct: Those of you who remain will waste away in the lands of your enemies because of their sins, and they will also waste away because of the sins of their ancestors.

verses.kjv: If they shall confess their iniquity, and the iniquity of their fathers, with their trespass which they trespassed against me, and that also they have walked contrary unto me;
verses.ct: But if they confess their sins and the sins of their ancestors — the unfaithfulness they committed against me and the way they opposed me,

verses.kjv: And that I also have walked contrary unto them, and have brought them into the land of their enemies; if then their uncircumcised hearts be humbled, and they then accept of the punishment of their iniquity:
verses.ct: which caused me to oppose them and bring them into the land of their enemies — if their stubborn hearts are finally humbled and they accept the punishment for their sins,

verses.kjv: Then will I remember my covenant with Jacob, and also my covenant with Isaac, and also my covenant with Abraham will I remember; and I will remember the land.
verses.ct: then I will remember my covenant with Jacob, my covenant with Isaac, and my covenant with Abraham, and I will remember the land.

verses.kjv: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.
verses.ct: The land will be abandoned by them and will enjoy its Sabbaths while it lies empty without them. They will accept the punishment for their sins, because they rejected my laws and despised my regulations.

verses.kjv: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the LORD their God.
verses.ct: Yet even so, while they are in the land of their enemies, I will not completely reject them or utterly destroy them, breaking my covenant with them, because I am the LORD their God.

verses.kjv: But I will for their sakes remember the covenant of their ancestors, whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt in the sight of the heathen, that I might be their God: I am the LORD.
verses.ct: For their sake, I will remember the covenant I made with their ancestors, whom I brought out of Egypt in full view of the nations so that I could be their God. I am the LORD."

verses.kjv: These are the statutes and judgments and laws, which the LORD made between him and the children of Israel in mount Sinai by the hand of Moses.
verses.ct: These are the regulations, laws, and instructions that the LORD established between himself and the people of Israel at Mount Sinai through Moses.
